alert.note: Alert for Northern Wasatch Front; Salt Lake Valley; Wasatch Mountains I-80 North (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 4:43PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...Strong outflow winds will impact portions of north central Salt Lake and eastern Davis Counties through 515 PM MDT... At 442 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong outflow winds near Woods Cross, or near Bountiful, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Salt Lake City, Layton, Bountiful, Farmington, Kaysville, North Salt Lake, Centerville, Woods Cross, South Weber, West Bountiful, Uintah, Salt Lake City International Airport, Fruit Heights and East Layton. This includes the following highways... Interstate 15 between mile markers 310 and 330. Interstate 84 between mile markers 88 and 89. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northern Wasatch Front; Salt Lake Valley; Wasatch Mountains I-80 North
